text: Hello, I'm relatively new to HubSpot CMS. I'm currently editing a blog. I'm trying to find a way to update paragraph font-size without having to go into the source-code and manually edit all the font-size CSS attributes one by one. So far I've tried adding an additional HTML code snippet in blog settings but it doesn't do anything....Thanks!
If you just want to modify it for one blog post you could do the CSS in <style> tags in the header of the blog post.
